channel.title: Minesweeper (it's in Dutch)
channel.description:
I made minesweeper for school in 2009. I never got around to actually deploying it, but I stumbled across it today so now I have.
It's fairly basic, but it works well and I just felt like sharing it :p
You can download it [url=schizosplayground.com/pers/Minesweeper.zip]here[/url]. It's about 14MB.
Edit: I know no-one cares, but I translated it to English because I was bored.
